entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
